citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
Both right and left rear hooves of the yak are excessively overgrown. This is causing a deformation of both feet.
Overgrown hooves can cause lameness, pain and can lead to other serious conditions. These hooves must be trimmed
and the licensee must follow a maintenance plan to keep them under control. Correct by 25 Aug. 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2)  Direct
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
Both right and left rear hooves of the yak are excessively overgrown. This is causing a deformation of both feet. 
Overgrown hooves can cause lameness, pain and can lead to other serious conditions. These hooves must be trimmed 
and the licensee must follow a maintenance plan to keep them under control. Correct by 25 Aug. 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
